page.description: The split layout of the Ink Control, this property appears after the 'Layout' property is set to 'split'. The 'v-view-editor' option will position the view above the editor. The 'v-editor-view' option will position the editor above the view. The 'h-view-editor' option will place the view on the left and the editor on the right. The last option, 'h-editor-view', will place the editor on the left and the view on the right.
